name: Tumble (itch) (derangedokapi)
description:
Tumble is a short, 3 level game about falling with style! 

Guide our hero around bees and toward coins to get your highest score.

This is my first complete Unity game, and I made it for My First Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021

Thanks for playing!

Credits:

  • Most assets are from kenney.nl - thank you!
  • Fonts
    • Grandstander by Tyler Finck (https://www.dafont.com/grandstander.font)
    • Soup of Justice by Omen Type (https://www.dafont.com/soup-of-justice.font
  • I learned some really excellent Unity fundamentals from the gamedev.tv 2D Unity course.
  • Github: https://github.com/derangedokapi/tumble
